features: 48-HOUR PROTECTION: Active lives need Degree Men Arctic Edge Deodorant. This deodorant for men delivers confidence with 48-hour odor protection
DERMATOLOGICALLY TESTED: This long-lasting deodorant for men features an aluminum-free formulation that keeps you fresh and won’t irritate sensitive skin
READY FOR WHAT’S NEXT: Take on the day with Degree Men Arctic Edge Deodorant stick. Simply twist, glide, and move
ARCTIC SCENT: Stay fresh with this deodorant. Degree Men Arctic Edge Deodorant features a scent of cool mint, crisp mandarin, and winter melon to keep you feeling fresh and cool
RECYCLE WITH DEGREE: As well as increasing our use of reusable materials, we’re making it easier for you to recycle our deodorant and dry spray packaging
GO BEYOND YOUR LIMITS: At Degree, we want to inspire the confidence in everyone to move more and go further. We’re here to support your journey through a deodorant for men that moves with you
body.description: Degree Men Arctic Edge Deodorant delivers 48-hour odor protection to keep you feeling fresh and confident. This deodorant for men works as hard as you do and offers 48-hour protection, so you can take on the day. Our Arctic Edge Deodorant features a fresh kick of cool mint, crisp mandarin, and winter melon. The powerful deodorant responds when you need it most, so you can stay confident without having to worry about slowing down. This long-lasting deodorant for men features an aluminum-free formulation that keeps you fresh and won’t irritate sensitive skin. You can be confident you’ll be protected from odor by this deodorant for men. Stay fresh and feel clean from morning to night. Simply twist, glide and get moving. The crisp, arctic scent helps to keep you as fresh as when you started your day. Stay dry, cool, and confident thanks to Degree Men Arctic Edge Deodorant. At Degree, we want to inspire the confidence in everyone to move more and go further. We’re here to support your journey through a deodorant that moves with you and helps you go beyond your limits.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: The average day is full of activity and short of time. Degree Men Arctic Edge 48h Deodorant helps you go beyond your limits with 48-hour odor protection and an extraordinary fragrance.

ALL-DAY FRESHNESS Whatever the day may bring, this deodorant keeps you protected. 48-HOUR ODOR PROTECTION This deodorant delivers unstoppable odor protection that helps keep you moving with confidence. UNSTOPPABLE CONFIDENCE Degree doesn't stop working, no matter how much you move. MOVING TOGETHER TOWARD REUSE At Degree, we're committed to creating the most reused and inclusive products possible. As well as increasing our use of reusable materials, we’re making it easier for you to recycle our deodorant and dry spray packaging.

Degree Men Advanced Nonstop Antiperspirant Deodorant, 2.7 oz Degree Men Intense Sport 48h Deodorant, 3 oz Degree Men Original Cool Rush Antiperspirant Deodorant Stick, 2.7 oz Main Benefit This antiperspirant deodorant helps you go beyond your limits with 72-hour sweat and odor protection and Degree's MotionSense technology. Degree Men Intense Sport Deodorant is a stick that leaves no stains and protects against body odor all day long. This antiperspirant deodorant with MotionSense technology delivers an energizing burst of crisp, arctic freshness with 72-hour sweat and odor protection.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Good deodorant! Smells good, last long. Better than female deodorant

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 18, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I use this all the time but I never received it. I paid a little over $5 for 2 so I tried buying it again and it is over $13 for 2.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 29, 2017
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This is my favorite deodorant. I have used it for as long ...
reviews.reviewText: This is my favorite deodorant. I have used it for as long as I can remember. I never worry about smelling. I think its priced right as well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 16, 2017
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best deodorant out there.
reviews.reviewText: Best deodorant out there. Other deodorants break me out and make my armpits foamy. This deodorant keeps me dry and doesn't irritate me.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 4, 2017
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars It does a good job. I don't like antiperspirant so I use ...
reviews.reviewText: It does a good job. I don't like antiperspirant so I use only deodorant. It holds as well as any.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 2, 2017
reviews.reviewText: Works great and smells good too.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 2, 2016
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Didn't work for my husband, but may for others
reviews.reviewText: It did not keep my husband dry and odor free. I ordered 2 & wish I had only ordered 1. This is a gel anti-perspirant so that might be the issue.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 16, 2016
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Blueish clear solid gel is the best!
reviews.reviewText: This blueish clear solid gel deodorant is the best out there!
